desc: Jewelry and art inspired by Tazia's culture, way of life, the land, and water.

layout.text: Bringing My Livelihood to Your Fingertips

From Metlakatla, Ts'msyen La̱xyuup (land) where Alaska's only Native Reserve resides, Gumboot Creations uses tradition and innovation to provide customers and muu (earring) collectors with fresh, yet timeless creations harvested and inspired by the land and water.
